title: Assessing pharmacists' awareness of financial indicators in community pharmacy management: A cross-sectional study
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Mohammad Abu Assab, Hisham E. Hasan, Hamza Alhamad, Fares Albahar, Abdallah Alzayadneh, Hanadi Abu Assab, Wael Abu Dayyih, Zainab Zakaraya
